cards.title: Malichae
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may discard a card to draw 3 cards now.
Select a damage type. Until the start of your next turn, change all damage dealt by hero targets to that type.

cards.title: Bait and Switch
body: Discard a Djinn card. If you do, you may put a Djinn from your trash into play or draw 2 cards.
You may use a power now.

flavorQuotes.text: Ezael, I need you now. Come forth on borrowed essence.

cards.title: Bathiel
body: At the end of your turn, this card may deal 1 target 2 energy damage.
This card is immune to energy damage.
When this card would be destroyed, destroy a Djinn ongoing attached to it and restore it to 5HP, otherwise put it in your hand.
cards.flavorReference: Entry in the Scrolls of Zephaeren

cards.title: Ezael
body: At the end of your turn, 2 hero targets each regain 1HP.
This card is immune to radiant damage.
When this card would be destroyed, destroy a Djinn ongoing attached to it and restore it to 5HP, otherwise put it in your hand.
cards.flavorReference: Entry in the Scrolls of Zephaeren

cards.title: Friendly Advice
body: One character regains 2HP.
One player may draw a card.
One player may put a card from their trash on top of their deck.
cards.flavorText: I travelled for years, looking for the Compass. I know a guy here we can talk to.

cards.title: Grand Bathiel
body: When this card enters play, attach it to Bathiel. If High Bathiel is ever not in play, destroy this card.
Power: Bathiel deals 1 target 6 energy damage.
At the end of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Alright, Bathiel, show 'em what they're made of.

cards.title: Grand Ezael
body: When this card enters play, attach it to Ezael. If High Ezael is ever not in play, destroy this card.
Power: All hero targets regain 3HP.
At the end of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Look after them, Ezael. Bathiel and I are going to finish this.

cards.title: Grand Reshiel
body: When this card enters play, attach it to Reshiel. If High Reshiel is ever not in play, destroy this card.
Power: Reshiel deals each non-hero target 2 sonic damage.
At the end of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: He is channeling his own lifeforce into the Djinn so that it may sustain its true form on this side of the Veil.

cards.title: Grand Somael
body: When this card enters play, attach it to Somael. If High Somael is ever not in play, destroy this card.
Power: Reduce damage dealt to hero targets by 2 until the start of your next turn.
At the end of your turn, destroy this card.
powers: Reduce damage dealt to hero targets by 2 until the start of your next turn.

flavorQuotes.text: It appears we are now under his protection.

cards.flavorReference: The Stranger, Book of the Dead #1022

cards.title: High Bathiel
body: When this card enters play, attach it to Bathiel. If Bathiel is ever not in play, destroy this card.
Increase damage dealt by Bathiel by 1.
Power: Bathiel deals 1 target 4 energy damage. Destroy this card.
powers: Bathiel deals 1 target 4 energy damage. Destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: When I finally broke through the Veil, he was the first Djinn I encountered. A lot's happened since then.

cards.title: High Ezael
body: When this card enters play, attach it to Ezael. If Ezael is ever not in play, destroy this card.
At the end of your turn, each Djinn regains 1HP.
Power: All Djinn regain 2HP. All other hero targets regain 1HP. Destroy this card.
powers: All Djinn regain 2HP. All other hero targets regain 1HP. Destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: If their medic's that good, how bad are their wars?

cards.title: High Reshiel
body: When this card enters play, attach it to Reshiel. If Reshiel is ever not in play, destroy this card.
Increase damage dealt by Reshiel by 1.
Power: Reshiel deals up to 3 targets 2 sonic damage each. Destroy this card.
powers: Reshiel deals up to 3 targets 2 sonic damage each. Destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: It disgusts me, the affinity that these denizens of the Veil have for a mortal. What has he done to earn their bond?

cards.title: High Somael
body: When this card enters play, attach it to Somael. If Somael is ever not in play, destroy this card.
Reduce damage dealt to Djinn by 1.
Power: Reduce damage dealt to hero targets by 1 until the start of your next turn. Destroy this card.
powers: Reduce damage dealt to hero targets by 1 until the start of your next turn. Destroy this card.

cards.title: Prismatic Vision
body: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put 2 into your hand and 1 into your trash.
You may play a Djinn now.
cards.flavorText: From the depths of the crystal, Bathiel's silent stare met Malichae's. He nodded once, slowly, and shattered it upon the ground.
cards.flavorReference: and shattered it upon the ground.

cards.title: Reshiel
body: At the end of your turn this card deals up to 2 targets 1 sonic damage each.
This card is immune to sonic damage.
When this card would be destroyed, destroy a Djinn ongoing attached to it and restore it to 5HP, otherwise put it in your hand.
cards.flavorReference: Entry in the Scrolls of Zephaeren

cards.title: Shadow Catch
body: Search your deck for a Djinn card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
You may draw a card.
You may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: It's been a long time, old friend.

cards.title: Solomon's Fire
cards.body: Play this card next to a target. Increase damage dealt to that target by Djinn cards by 1. If that target leaves play, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: It calls out to the Djinn in this foreign place. Like a taste of home, like blood in the water.

cards.title: Somael
body: At the end of your turn select a hero target. Reduce damage dealt to that target by 1 until the start of your turn.
This card is immune to projectile damage.
When this card would be destroyed, destroy a Djinn ongoing attached to it and restore it to 5HP, otherwise put it in your hand.
cards.flavorReference: Entry in the Scrolls of Zephaeren

cards.title: Summoning Crystal
cards.body: Power: Put a Djinn from your hand into play.
powers: Put a Djinn from your hand into play.

flavorQuotes.text: Think of it as a lock, guarding the Djinn's location in the other realm. Until you break it, and it becomes a door.

cards.title: Unshackled
cards.body: You may use an additional power during your power phase.

flavorQuotes.text: She's only got two volumes. Off isn't one of them!

cards.title: Zephaeren's Compass
cards.body: Power: Put a Djinn target in play back into your hand. If you do, destroy up to X ongoing or environment cards, where X is 1 plus the number of Djinn ongoings attached to that target.
powers: Put a Djinn target in play back into your hand. If you do, destroy up to X ongoing or environment cards, where X is 1 plus the number of Djinn ongoings attached to that target.

flavorQuotes.text: The compass shows the path back to their realm. And when that door opens, you're going along for the ride!

promoCards.title: Malichae
powers: Search your deck for a djinn and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may reveal the top 2 cards of their deck, discard 1 and replace the other.
One player may draw a card now.

promoCards.title: Malichae
powers: Discard a card. Use that card's power, replacing any djinn's name with {Malichae}. Draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One may use a power now.
Until the start of your next turn, whenever a hero would be dealt exactly 1 damage, prevent that damage.
